entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:24 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
